text:
Hello, team! I'm looking into the facilities of Lists API and I have a few questions.
Is it possible to fetch contacts from several lists (more than one list) in one API request? i.e. get all contacts who are included in List1 OR included in List2 OR included in List3.

And next question:
Are there any webhooks that are triggered when a contact was added to the list or removed from the list? Are there any webhooks when the size of the list was changed?

Hello, we're user of HubSpot modules in Make.
Is there a link between the fact that <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/lists/overview|legacy v1 Lists API> will be sunset in May and the upgrade of some HubSpot modules in Make ? When I click on the button nothing happens.
Thanks!
